name: Pen's Hords
description:
Description:

Pen's Hords is the multiplayer 2D zombie game you need in your life! Its made together with Unity, is currently in Development and is a learning project of mine to learn Photon Pun2 as well as become better with making games. Any recommendations and/or Bugs are appreciated. Over the next few days/weeks/months I will upload recent updates until its finished. 

Controls: 

Movement is WASD

Shoot with your left mouse button

Everything else should be self-explanatory.
